verses.verse: David's <WH1732> Psalm of praise <WH8416>. I will extol <WH7311> <WH8787> thee, my 'Elohim <WH430>, O king <WH4428>; and I will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
Havahry day <WH3117> will I bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee; and I will praise <WH1984> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
Great <WH1419> is the YY <WH3068>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> <WH8794>; and his greatness <WH1420> is unsearchable <WH2714>.
One <WH1755> generation <WH1755> shall praise <WH7623> <WH8762> thy works <WH4639> to another, and shall declare <WH5046> <WH8686> thy mighty acts <WH1369>.
I will speak <WH7878> <WH8799> of the glorious <WH3519> honour <WH1926> of thy majesty <WH1935>, and of thy wondrous <WH6381> <WH8737> works <WH1697>.
And men shall speak <WH559> <WH8799> of the might <WH5807> of thy terrible acts <WH3372> <WH8737>: and I will declare <WH5608> <WH8762> thy greatness <WH1420>.
They shall abundantly utter <WH5042> <WH8686> the memory <WH2143> of thy great <WH7227> goodness <WH2898>, and shall sing <WH7442> <WH8762> of thy righteousness <WH6666>.
The YY <WH3068> is gracious <WH2587>, and full of compassion <WH7349>; slow <WH750> to anger <WH639>, and of great <WH1419> mercy <WH2617>.
The YY <WH3068> is good <WH2896> to all: and his tender mercies <WH7356> are over all his works <WH4639>.
All thy works <WH4639> shall praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH3068>; and thy saints <WH2623> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee.
They shall speak <WH559> <WH8799> of the glory <WH3519> of thy kingdom <WH4438>, and talk <WH1696> <WH8762> of thy power <WH1369>;
To make known <WH3045> <WH8687> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> his mighty acts <WH1369>, and the glorious <WH3519> majesty <WH1926> of his kingdom <WH4438>.
Thy kingdom <WH4438> is an everlasting <WH5769> kingdom <WH4438>, and thy dominion <WH4475> endureth throughout all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
The YY <WH3068> upholdeth <WH5564> <WH8802> all that fall <WH5307> <WH8802>, and raiseht up <WH2210> <WH8802> all those that be bowed down <WH3721> <WH8803>.
The eyes <WH5869> of all wait <WH7663> <WH8762> upon thee; and thou givest <WH5414> <WH8802> them their meat <WH400> in due season <WH6256>.
Thou openest <WH6605> <WH8802> thine hand <WH3027>, and satisfiest <WH7646> <WH8688> the desire <WH7522> of every living thing <WH2416>.
The YY <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662> in all his ways <WH1870>, and holy <WH2623> in all his works <WH4639>.
The YY <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto all them that call <WH7121> <WH8802> upon him, to all that call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon him in truth <WH571>.
He will fulfil <WH6213> <WH8799> the desire <WH7522> of them that fear <WH3373> him: he also will hear <WH8085> <WH8799> their cry <WH7775>, and will save <WH3467> <WH8686> them.
The YY <WH3068> preserveth <WH8104> <WH8802> all them that love <WH157> <WH8802> him: but all the wicked <WH7563> will he destroy <WH8045> <WH8686>.

My mouth <WH6310> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> the praise <WH8416> of the YY <WH3068>: and let all flesh <WH1320> bless <WH1288> <WH8762> his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
